xml.data:
Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 10 Mahantaraduka » 10.14 Upādinnaduka » 10.14.5 Saṃsaṭṭhavāra
10.14.5.1--4 Paccayānulomādi
Mahantaraduka
Upādinnaduka
Saṃsaṭṭhavāra
Paccayānulomādi
443.
3435Upādinnaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho upādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—  upādinnaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā…pe…  dve khandhe…pe…  paṭisandhikkhaṇe…pe… .
3436Anupādinnaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho anupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—  anupādinnaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā…pe…  dve khandhe…pe… . (1)
3437Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā ekaṃ, anantare dve, samanantare dve, sahajāte dve, aññamaññe dve, nissaye dve, upanissaye dve, purejāte dve, āsevane ekaṃ, kamme dve, vipāke dve…pe…  avigate dve.
3438Anulomaṃ.
444.
3439Upādinnaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho upādinno dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—  ahetukaṃ upādinnaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā…pe…  dve khandhe…pe…  ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe…pe… . (1)
3440Anupādinnaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho anupādinno dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—  ahetukaṃ anupādinnaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā…pe…  dve khandhe…pe…  vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe saṃsaṭṭho vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. (1)
3441Nahetuyā dve, naadhipatiyā dve, napurejāte dve, napacchājāte dve, naāsevane dve, nakamme ekaṃ, navipāke ekaṃ, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge dve, navippayutte dve.
3442Paccanīyaṃ.
